questions.content: What was the first CAD Software ?
questions.explanation: The beginnings of BIM appeared in 1963 when Sutherland created Sketchpad software, a precursor of the graphical interface and CAD.

questions.content: What are the advantages of 3D CAD ?
questions.explanation: et certains se font beaucoup beaucoup d'argent

answers.content: We can easier communicate on the project than in 2D CAD
We can create and try imagine different versions
We have several independant drawings (floor plans, elevations...)
